title: Mastering JavaScript Proxies and Reflect for Real-World Use
author: Zziwa Raymond Ian
description: JavaScript Proxies and the Reflect API offer incredible control over object behavior, unlocking new ways to solve common development challenges.
cntitle: 掌握 JavaScript Proxies 和 Reflect 以进行实际应用
cndescription: JavaScript Proxies 和 Reflect API 提供了对对象行为的强大控制，从而能够以新的方式解决常见的开发挑战。
